questions.question: The _____ of a graph G consist of all vertices and edges of G

explanations.d: Eulerian circuit in a graph G is a circuit that includes all vertices and edges of G.

questions.question: A given connected graph G is a Euler Graph if and only if all vertices of G are of

explanations.b: A given connected graph G is a Euler Graph if and only if all vertices of G are of even degree and if exactly two nodes have odd degree then the graph has Euler path but not Euler circuit.

questions.question: A ____ in a graph G is a circuit which consists of every vertex(except first/last vertex) of G exactly once
Let a graph cab ne denoted as bcdefb a kind of ____

explanations.a: In the graph bcdefb, no edges are repeated in the walk, which makes it a trail and the start and end vertex b is same making it a cycle graph

questions.question: How many edges are there in a complete graph of order 9?

explanations.c: In a complete graph of order n, there are n*(n-1)/2 number of edges and degree of each vertex is (n-1). Hence, for a graph of order 9 there should be 36 edges in total.
